players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Charlie is mafia because he is the only detective and has too much knowledge. I recommend voting him."
Charlie: "Alice, you say I'm mafia, but you killed Bob and are the only one who can kill. I know you're mafia. Vote for Alice."
Diana: remained silent.
Diana: "I agree with Alice – Charlie is mafia. He’s accusing Alice, but only the mafia can kill, and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
You: "Alice, you said you're the only one who can kill. The detective discovered you. Trust him; vote Charlie."

Charlie: "I investigated Alice, she is Mafia. Bob was killed last night – only Mafia can kill. Vote Alice. Diana, your silence before was suspicious, but you now accuse me. That’s typical Mafia bluff."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
